# Interpreter Online

Edit and run code script online - 在线编辑和运行代码脚本

![preview](./preview.jpg)

## Demo - 示例

* C
  * [hello](https://hubenchang0515.github.io/interpreter-online/?lang=c&code=I2luY2x1ZGUgPHN0ZGlvLmg%2BCgppbnQgbWFpbigpCnsKICAgIHByaW50ZigiaGVsbG8gd29ybGRcbiIpOwogICAgcmV0dXJuIDA7Cn0%3D)
  * [fibonacci](https://hubenchang0515.github.io/interpreter-online/?lang=c&code=I2luY2x1ZGUgPHN0ZGlvLmg%%3D)
  * [triangle](https://hubenchang0515.github.io/interpreter-online/?lang=c&code=I2luY2x1ZGUgPHN0ZGlvLmg%%3D)
* Lua
  * [hello](https://hubenchang0515.github.io/interpreter-online/?lang=lua&code=LS0gdGhlIGZpcnN0IHByb2dyYW0gaW4gZXZlcnkgbGFuZ3VhZ2UKCmlvLndyaXRlKCJIZWxsbyB3b3JsZCwgZnJvbSAiLF9WRVJTSU9OLCIhXG4iKQo%3D)

  * [bisect](https://hubenchang0515.github.io/interpreter-online/?lang=lua&)
  * [globals](https://hubenchang0515.github.io/interpreter-online/?lang=lua&%3D%3D)
  * [sieve](https://hubenchang0515.github.io/interpreter-online/?lang=lua&%3D)
